Stats Royale has been rewritten from the ground up. For the techies out there, it's now native swift. Huge performance gains. No more white screens. No more lag switching tabs. Most bugs squished. Views have been improved and cleaned up. We hope that you will enjoy all these improvements.

Please note that iOS 8 support has been dropped with this release.

App has been completely rewritten from scratch. Now Includes tournaments. If you notice any issues, let us know by joining our discord -> https://discord.gg/statsroyale so we can get to it quickly!
